bibl.title: The Parchments and Papyri. With an Account of the Three Iranian Fragments by W.B. Henning.

series.title: The Excavations at Dura-Europos. Final Report V. Part

bibl.seg: Welles C. Bradford, O. Fink and J. Frank Gilliam, The Parchments and Papyri. With an Account of the Three Iranian Fragments by W.B. Henning. (The Excavations at Dura-Europos. Final Report V. Part I.)
New Haven, Yale University Press, 1959, 4Â°, xxviii-457 pp. et LXXI pll.

C.R. par Aristide Calderini, Aegyptus 38 (1958) pp. 232-233. - John Day, AJA 64 (1960) pp. 396-397. - du Mesnil du Buisson, BibO 17 (1960) pp. 238-239. - J.A. Goldstein, JAOS 81 (1961) pp. 429-432. - Joseph Modrzejewski, Iura 12 (1961) pp. 294-303. - Jacques Schwartz, BFS 38 (1959-1960) pp. 201-202. - Morton Smith, CW 53 (1960) p. 264. - Eric G. Turner, AntJ 40 (1960) pp. 230-231; - JRS 50 (1960) pp. 243-246. - Hans Julius Wolff, ZSav 77 (1960) pp. 444-447.
